an5.61:1.1: “Pancima, bhikkhave, sanna bhavita bahulikata mahapphala honti mahanisamsa amatogadha amatapariyosana.
an5.61:1.3: Asubhasanna, maranasanna, adinavasanna, ahare patikulasanna, sabbaloke anabhiratasanna—
an5.61:1.4: ima kho, bhikkhave, panca sanna bhavita bahulikata mahapphala honti mahanisamsa amatogadha amatapariyosana”ti.
